title: Spicy tomato pasta with garlic prawns
ingredients: ['6 cloves of garlic, chopped', '1 large red onion, chopped', 'glug of olive oil', '1/2 tsp yellow bean curry paste (dependant on your personal taste add more for a spicier sauce)', '350g penne pasta', '1 (400g) tin of chopped tomatoes', 'handful of fresh basil, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'peeled and pre-cooked king Prawns (decent sized)', 'a knob of butter']
